items.sentence: Tom speaks excellent French, but his English isn\'t very good.
Tom doesn\'t want to admit that he doesn\'t know how to do it.
Just between ourselves, I don\'t think he\'s going to succeed.
She spends a majority of her time taking care of her children.
She was advised by him to go abroad while she was still young.
I doubt that Tom will ever learn how to speak French properly.
I had a few hours free, so I sat under a tree and read a book.
Tom says he hasn\'t seen Mary since he graduated from college.
Why is it that women usually shave their legs, but men don\'t?
Both Tom and Mary are in the living room, watching television.
